Hi,
 
I have been using Heritrix 1.2 with an order file containing the entries

  <integer name="max-link-hops">1</integer>
  <integer name="max-trans-hops">1</integer>

and the seed URL http://www.umwelt-schweiz.ch.

The result with 1.2 was that I got a crawl that had a depth of 1 which
was the desired thing.

But when I switched to Heritrix 1.4 using the same order file with the
above entries the crawler went to an actual crawl depth of 3. 

Now is this a bug or a deliberate change? And how can I restrict the
crawler again to depth 1?
 
Bye,
Holger
